text: kya vah vyakti jo pahale murda tha, phir use hamane jeevit kiya aur usake lie ek prakaash upalabdh kiya jisako lie hue vah logon ke beech chalata-phirata hai, us vyakti ko tarah ho sakata hai jo andheron mein pada hua ho, usase kadaapi nikalanevaala na ho? aise hee inakaar karanevaalon ke karm unake lie suhaabane banae gae hai
